About Shuddh Swad

Our Story

Shuddh Swad was born from a passion for preserving the authentic flavors of traditional Bihari sweets. Our journey began with a simple mission: to bring the taste of home-made thekua to every household, made with pure, natural ingredients without any artificial additives.

Each piece of our thekua is crafted with love and care, using recipes passed down through generations. We believe in quality over quantity, ensuring that every bite delivers the genuine taste of tradition.

From our small kitchen to your table, Shuddh Swad represents purity, authenticity, and the joy of sharing traditional sweets with loved ones.

Why Choose Shuddh Swad?

🌿

Pure & Natural

Made with 100% natural ingredients, no artificial colors or preservatives.

🏠

Traditional Recipes

Authentic Bihari recipes passed down through generations.

❤️

Made with Love

Each piece is handcrafted with care and attention to detail.
